Nightlight/Windlord::

Nighlight had transformed before the shot to robot, she just could 
turn her body and she felt a hit that made her fall. "Why... Why???" 
it was the only thing that she said.

Termitron had left Trynity in a safe place.

Windlord screamed "Areotaur, he shot her!!!!!... HE SHOT NIGHLIGHT!!!"

--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Soulstice Omega" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Gramps heard what Perplex said. It angered him. he drew a blaster, 
a large one.
> 
> Gramps: This shows how much I care!
> 
> Gramps fires it at Nightlight...
